messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Re: Montana
messages.msgSnippet: Your name sounds so familiar to me, and well I grew up in Anaconda so it s only a stone s throw away. Kelly Deb Lewis  wrote: ***We live
messages.messageBody:
Your name sounds so familiar to me, and well I grew up in Anaconda so it's only a stone's throw away.
Kelly

Deb Lewis <d.lewis@...> wrote:
***We live in Havre, MT. Who's Deb Lewis? ***

Well, I'm the BRILLIANT one! Weren't you paying attention? <g>

I'm Deb Lewis, 44, mom to unschooler, Dylan Lewis, who will be fifteen in
May. We're in Deer Lodge, a long way from Havre.
And I've been gone a month or so and am reading, reading, reading through
hundreds of posts... Some y'all need to get out more. <g>

Deb Lewis, in sunny southwest Montana where it snowed a skiff last night but
where the expected high today will be a balmy 54 degrees Fahrenheit.






---------------------------------
Food fight? Enjoy some healthy debate
in the Yahoo! Answers Food & Drink Q&A.

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
